perturbation.original_text: This Sponsorship Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of the 14th day of May, 1999 ("Effective Date"), by and between Intuit Inc. a Delaware corporation, located at 2550 Garcia Ave., Mountain View, California 94043 ("Intuit"), and Stamps.com Inc., a Delaware corporation, located at 2900 31st Street, Suite 150, Santa Monica, CA 90405-3035 ("Client").
perturbation.changed_text: This Sponsorship Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of the 14th day of May, 1999 ("Effective Date"), by and between Intuit Inc. a Delaware corporation, located at 2550 Garcia Ave., Mountain View, California 94043 ("Intuit"), and Stamps.com Inc., a Delaware corporation, located at 2900 31st Street, Suite 150, Santa Monica, CA 90405-3035 ("Customer").
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Client' is replaced with 'Customer'. Later in the document, 'Client' is still used, creating confusion as to whether they refer to the same entity and whether the obligations of 'Client' also apply to 'Customer'.

perturbation.original_text: 10.1 Sponsorship, Advertising and Exclusivity Fees.  Client will pay Intuit       ---------------------------------------------      sponsorship and advertising fees of $2,644,010 and an exclusivity fee of      $661,003.  Such fees shall be paid to Intuit as follows.  An initial fee of      $[***] shall be due and payable on the Effective Date.  The remaining        ---      balance of $[***] shall be paid to Intuit in 12 equal monthly installments                   ---      of [***]. Each monthly installment should be payable in advance and due no          ---      later than the fifth (5th) of the month.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.1 Sponsorship, Advertising and Exclusivity Fees.  Customer will pay Intuit sponsorship and advertising fees of $2,644,010 and an exclusivity fee of $661,003.  Such fees shall be paid to Intuit as follows.  An initial fee of $[***] shall be due and payable on the Effective Date.  The remaining balance of $[***] shall be paid to Intuit in 12 equal monthly installments of [***]. Each monthly installment should be payable in advance and due no later than the fifth (5th) of the month.
perturbation.explanation: Here the contract uses Customer instead of Client.

perturbation.original_text: 8.1  Client Obligations.  Client will use reasonable efforts to assist Intuit in      ------------------      implementing the promotional placements and advertising described in the      Agreement.  The parties recognize that the Launch Date can be met only if      Client provides final versions of all Client Graphics, text, Banner      Advertisements and other promotional media and valid URL links necessary to      implement the promotional placements and
perturbation.changed_text: 8.1  Partner Obligations.  Partner will use reasonable efforts to assist Intuit in implementing the promotional placements and advertising described in the Agreement. The parties recognize that the Launch Date can be met only if Client provides final versions of all Client Graphics, text, Banner Advertisements and other promotional media and valid URL links necessary to implement the promotional placements and
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Client' is replaced with 'Partner', creating confusion with the definition of client.
